name: WORLD GENERATOR 2.0
description:
WORLD GENERATOR 2.0

This is a program that generates random worlds, based on an algorithm made by https://grelf.itch.io/forest.

Reload the page and a new world gets created! Also be sure to click the screen to start exploring. Don't know where you're headed? Look down at the arrow.

CONTROLS:
WASD = move around
Q & E = move up/down
mouse = look around

You should be able to explore in all directions and very far away (though, the faster you move the more buggy, and sometimes you have to wait for the "good" graphics to "pop in").

This version of WORLD GENERATOR takes a step away from generating a N64-like world and one step closer to generate a GameCube-like world. Wanna know when I release the next groundbreaking world generator/semi-game engine that takes one step closer to generate a PS3-like world? Follow my Twitter.
